name: A bicycle is two unicycles
description:
A bicycle is two unicycles (joined together), is a game, (and also an independent clause) where you control a malfunctioning bike, with separate controls for each wheel.

The front wheel is controlled with left, right and up arrow keys, (< > ^) and the back wheel is controlled with A, D and W keys (WASD - but without the S). 

The goal of this 4 levelled game is to reach the end of each level to win! (The red flag on the yellow platform)

Have fun!

P.S. I couldn't come up with a better name :P

P.P.S. Its not as easy as it looks, but it just takes a little more patience and skill to maneuver about. ;) but all levels are definitely completable (Watch the video linked with me completing all of it - in good time too :D) (I'll link it a day after the jam)
